statements: DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE id = 100 AND protocol = 'TCP';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND data_size > 1000;
DELETE FROM cyber_threats WHERE threat_severity > 5 AND threat_type = 'Malware';
DELETE FROM threat_detection WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' AND severity = 5;
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND device_id = '8c3e12a1-3469-4e0d-af6d-27d8aef913ca';
DELETE FROM threat_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious Activity' AND alert_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
